# Theory and Practice of Image B-Spline Interpolation #

## Summary ##
Utility functions for performing B-spline interpolation of an image.
It is part of an [IPOL publication](https://doi.org/10.5201/ipol.2018.221)

## Authors ##

* Thibaud Briand <thibaud.briand@enpc.fr>
* Pascal Monasse <monasse@imagine.enpc.fr>

Laboratoire d'Informatique Gaspard Monge (LIGM)/
Ecole des Ponts ParisTech

## Version ##
Version 1.0, released on 06/27/2018
